The drunk doesn't reply, but instead finishes transforming into a 
large black lowrider, covered with armor. Weapons emerge from his 
sides and hood, but instead of firing he just flies(/falls) down at 
Arty, his underside as armored as his sides.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> --- Pacifix / Crossroads ---
> 
> Pacifix keeps running after Grimlock, trying to catch up.
> 
> Crossroads twists out of the drunk's hands as the drunk 
> transforms. The shield and sword fold together and Crossroads' 
> robot form emerges as he falls away from the drunk. "Try to get 
> ontop of him, the extra weight will probably stop him from moving 
or 
> shooting too much." He yells as he lands near the location that 
> Pacifix had entered in.
